title: Profile
description: Update your personal information and contact details.

information.title: Information
information.description: Update your personal information and contact details.
information.displayNameDescription: The name displayed to other users.
information.phoneNumberDescription: Your phone number for account recovery and notifications.

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.description: Customize your experience with theme, language, and display settings.
preferences.devicePreferencesDescription: These settings are stored on this device and will persist across logins.

language.label: Language
language.description: Select your preferred language for the interface.

timezone.label: Timezone
timezone.description: Set your timezone for accurate date and time display.

itemsPerPage.label: Items per Page
itemsPerPage.description: Number of items shown per page in lists and tables.

density.label: Interface Density
density.description: Adjust the spacing and size of UI elements.

security.title: Security
security.description: Manage your account security settings and sign-in methods.

signInMethods.title: Sign-in methods
signInMethods.description: Manage how you sign in to your account.

emails.title: Email Addresses
emails.description: Manage your email addresses. You can sign in with any verified email.
emails.primaryDescription: This is your primary email for notifications and login display
emails.verifiedDescription: This email can be used to sign in
emails.unverifiedDescription: Verify this email to use it for sign in

manageDialog.title: Manage Email Addresses
manageDialog.description: You can sign in with any verified email. One email is primary and used for notifications.

addDialog.title: Add Email Address
addDialog.description: Add a secondary email address to your account. You'll need to verify it before you can use it.
addDialog.emailHint: A verification code will be sent to this email

verifyDialog.title: Verify Email
verifyDialog.description: Enter the 6-digit verification code sent to {email}.

removeDialog.title: Remove Email?
removeDialog.description: The email {email} will be removed from your account. You won't be able to sign in with it anymore.

primaryDialog.title: Change Primary Email?
primaryDialog.description: This will change your primary email to {email}. All notifications will be sent to this address, and your current sessions will be signed out.

emails.addSuccess: Email added. Please check your inbox for the verification code.

google.title: Google
google.connectedDescription: Sign in with your Google account
google.disconnectedDescription: Connect your Google account for quick sign-in

passkeys.title: Passkeys
passkeys.connectedDescription: Sign in with fingerprint, face, or security key
passkeys.disconnectedDescription: Use biometrics or security keys for passwordless sign-in

twoFactor.title: Two-factor methods
twoFactor.description: Secure your account with additional authentication methods.
twoFactor.emailRequired: Email verification is required to enable two-factor authentication

email.title: Email codes
email.enabledDescription: Receive 6-digit codes via email when signing in
email.disabledDescription: Get verification codes sent to your email address

totp.title: Authenticator app
totp.enabledDescription: Use apps like Google Authenticator or Authy for TOTP codes
totp.disabledDescription: Use apps like Google Authenticator or Authy for TOTP codes

disableEmail.title: Disable email verification codes?
disableEmail.description: This will reduce your account security. You can re-enable it at any time.

disableTotp.title: Disable authenticator app?
disableTotp.description: This will remove the authenticator app from your account. You can set it up again at any time.

recoveryCodes.title: Recovery codes
recoveryCodes.description: Use these codes to sign in if you lose access to your 2FA methods

regenerate.title: Regenerate recovery codes?
regenerate.description: This will invalidate all existing recovery codes. Make sure to save the new codes in a safe place.

errors.loadFailed: Failed to load security settings. Please try again.

changeEmail.title: Change Email Address
changeEmail.description: Enter your new email address to receive a verification code.
changeEmail.verificationDescription: We've sent a verification code to {email}. Enter the code below to confirm the change.

errors.emptyEmail: Please enter a new email address
errors.sameEmail: New email must be different from current email

verifyEmail.title: Verify Email Address
verifyEmail.description: We've sent a verification code to {email}. Enter the code below to verify your email.
verifyEmail.sendingCode: Sending verification code to your email address...

avatarUpload.title: Change Profile Picture
avatarUpload.description: Upload a new profile picture or remove the current one.

email2FA.title: Enable Email 2FA
email2FA.description: Secure your account with email-based two-factor authentication
email2FA.enterCode: Enter the 6-digit code from your email:

totp2FA.title: Enable Authenticator
totp2FA.description: Secure your account with time-based one-time password (TOTP) two-factor authentication
totp2FA.scanQrCode: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app:
totp2FA.enterCode: Enter the 6-digit code from your app:
totp2FA.backupCodesDescription: Store these codes in a safe place. Each code can only be used once to sign in if you lose access to your authenticator app.
totp2FA.backupWarning: You won't be able to see these codes again. If you lose both your authenticator app and these backup codes, you may lose access to your account.
totp2FA.backupFileDescription: These codes can be used to access your account if you lose access to your authenticator app. Each code can only be used once.
totp2FA.backupFileKeepSafe: Keep these codes in a safe place!
totp2FA.codesCopied: All backup codes copied to clipboard

changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.description: Update your account password. Make sure to use a strong password.

totp.title: Enable Authenticator
totp.description: Secure your account with time-based one-time password (TOTP) two-factor authentication
totp.step1Description: Download Google Authenticator, Authy, or any TOTP-compatible app
totp.step2Description: Open your authenticator app and scan this QR code
totp.manualEntry: Can't scan? Enter this code manually:
totp.step3Description: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
totp.backupDescription: These codes can be used to access your account if you lose access to your authenticator app. Each code can only be used once.
totp.keepSafe: Keep these codes in a safe place!
totp.codesCopied: All backup codes copied to clipboard

passkeys.title: Manage passkeys
passkeys.description: View and manage your registered passkeys for passwordless sign-in.
passkeys.emptyDescription: Add a passkey to sign in without a password
passkeys.deleteDescription: This passkey will be permanently removed. You won't be able to use it to sign in anymore.
passkeys.renameDescription: Enter a new name for this passkey

errors.sameEmail: New email must be different from current email

emails.added: Email added. Check your inbox for the verification code.

errors.alreadyAdded: You already have this email address
errors.inUse: This email is already in use by another account
errors.cannotRemovePrimary: Cannot remove your primary email address
errors.cannotRemoveOnly: Cannot remove your only email address
errors.notVerified: Email must be verified before setting as primary

email.codeSent: Verification code sent to your email

errors.enableFailed: Failed to enable Email Two-Factor Authentication
errors.disableFailed: Failed to disable Email Two-Factor Authentication
errors.alreadyEnabled: Email Two-Factor Authentication is already enabled

errors.setupFailed: Failed to setup TOTP Two-Factor Authentication
errors.enableFailed: Failed to enable TOTP Two-Factor Authentication
errors.disableFailed: Failed to disable TOTP Two-Factor Authentication

errors.totpRequired: TOTP must be enabled to regenerate backup codes

errors.fetchFailed: Failed to fetch Google account status
errors.userInfoFailed: Failed to get user information from Google
errors.linkedToOther: This Google account is linked to another user

errors.invalidCredentials: Invalid credentials. Please check and try again.
errors.tooManyAttempts: Too many attempts. Please try again later.

sessions.title: Active Sessions
sessions.description: Manage your active sessions across devices. You can revoke sessions you don't recognize.
sessions.revokeDescription: This will log you out from this device. You'll need to sign in again.
sessions.revokeOtherDescription: This will log you out from all other devices. Only your current session will remain active.
sessions.noOtherSessions: No other active sessions. You're only signed in on this device.
sessions.searchPlaceholder: Search by browser, OS, or location...

loginHistory.title: Login History
loginHistory.description: View your recent sign-in activity and monitor for suspicious access.
loginHistory.searchPlaceholder: Search by browser, OS, location, or IP...

stepUpAuth.title: Verify your identity
stepUpAuth.description: For your security, please confirm your identity before making changes to your account.

passkey.title: Use passkey
passkey.description: Use your fingerprint, face, or security key

stepUpAuth.passkeyPrompt: Click the button below to verify with your passkey

errors.loadFailed: Failed to load profile. Please try again.
